TextView.android:text: Ever dreamt of building a masterpiece structure? Ever wanted to showcase the real structural engineering skill in you? Here is your chance to prove your mettle as a successful engineer. Show the world, what a bunch of popsicle sticks and glue can do!

Cantilever structures have many applications in daily life and there is always a need of a stable and a feasible structure. Techfest 2015 brings to you its most sophisticated structural design competition “Cantilivo”. Come, be a part of this extraordinary competition where you need skill along with your brains.
